ch0116_00_hikari/0101_0701_01_10:
Oh, hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve been
waiting for you. Let’s go adventuring today!
ch0116_00_hikari/0101_0701_02_10:
Don’t worry—I’ll act as your mentor. I’ve got a bit
more experience than you.
ch0116_00_hikari/0601_0701_01_10:
How long has it been since you came to Pasio?
Have you run into any problems?
ch0116_00_hikari/0601_0701_02_10:
When I first arrived on Pasio, I had no clue what
I was doing. I bet it was the same for you, too.
ch0116_00_hikari/0601_0701_03_10:
It’s important for Trainers to help each other out!
If you ever need help, I’ll lend you a hand!
ch0116_00_hikari/0601_0702_01_10:
I’ve gotten where I am today because so many
kind people helped me along the way.
ch0116_00_hikari/0601_0702_02_10:
When someone is kind to me, it makes me want to
pay it forward and be kind to someone else.
ch0116_00_hikari/0602_0701_01_10: Pasio is a totally new place to me.
ch0116_00_hikari/0602_0701_02_10:
It’s so exciting! There’s just so much to see and do
on Pasio. I haven’t had any time to calm down!
ch0116_00_hikari/0602_0701_03_10:
I can’t wait to share these experiences with
everyone back in Twinleaf Town!
ch0116_00_hikari/0602_0702_01_10:
I’m sure this is obvious, but there are Trainers
from all over here on Pasio.
ch0116_00_hikari/0602_0702_02_10:
Where are you from? I’d like to go see it for
myself someday!
ch0116_00_hikari/0603_0701_01_10:
It looks like no matter where you go, there are
people who use Pokémon to do bad things...
ch0116_00_hikari/0603_0701_02_10:
In the Sinnoh region, there was a nasty group
called Team Galactic.
ch0116_00_hikari/0603_0701_03_10: We put a stop to them, though!
ch0116_00_hikari/0603_0702_01_10:
I feel so sorry for the Pokémon that are used by
evil people.
ch0116_00_hikari/0603_0702_02_10:
Pokémon just want to help a Trainer that they truly
care about...
ch0116_00_hikari/0603_0702_03_10:
I’m not worried at all about your partner
Pokémon, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I know
you’re a good person.
ch0116_00_hikari/0604_0701_01_10:
Why does stuff always go missing when you’re 
short on time in the morning?
ch0116_00_hikari/0604_0701_02_10:
“Where'd that briefcase go?! What happened to
my Pokédex?!” And before you know it, you’re
half past late!
ch0116_00_hikari/0604_0701_03_10:
*sigh*
Why are mornings such a hassle?
ch0116_00_hikari/0604_0702_01_10:
I can be a little impatient at times, but my
childhood friend Barry just rushes into things
without thinking.
ch0116_00_hikari/0604_0702_02_10:
But...I wonder if Barry thinks I’m the more
impatient one.
ch0116_00_hikari/0605_0701_01_10:
Meeting any Pokémon is just a matter of being in
the right place at the right time.
ch0116_00_hikari/0605_0701_02_10:
If I had been doing something different that day,
I never would have met my partner Pokémon.
ch0116_00_hikari/0605_0701_03_10:
But...considering how we met and the fact that
we’re a sync pair now, I wouldn’t have it any
other way!
ch0116_00_hikari/0605_0702_01_10:
I’ve come this far by believing in myself and
always charging forward.
ch0116_00_hikari/0605_0702_02_10:
But there’s more to it than that! People and
Pokémon are bound by an invisible thread
of destiny!
ch0116_00_hikari/0605_0702_03_10:
Maybe meeting you, [Name:PlayerNickname ],
was destined to happen!
ch0116_00_hikari/1701_0701_01_10:
I’ve got a really great item on me right now.
I think I’ll share it with you.
ch0116_00_hikari/1701_0701_02_10:
That’s a gift from me, OK?
Make sure to use it wisely!
ch0116_00_hikari/1701_0702_01_10:
But if you’re in a situation where you really need
to use it, don’t be shy about doing so!
ch0116_00_hikari/2501_0701_01_10: As your mentor, I’ve got to look out for you.
ch0116_00_hikari/2501_0701_02_10:
But I know you’re not some junior Trainer that
needs to be babysat, either.
ch0116_00_hikari/2501_0701_03_10:
I don’t think you’re below me at all. That’s why
I want you standing by my side like a true rival.
ch0116_00_hikari/2501_0702_02_10:
Don’t worry about who has more experience!
Let’s just push each other to grow stronger like
rivals do!
ch0116_00_hikari/2511_0701_01_10:
There are so many people I don’t know on Pasio.
At first it was a bit discouraging...
ch0116_00_hikari/2511_0701_02_10:
Getting to know you and your partner Pokémon
has been really reassuring. Thanks to that, I’ve
been enjoying every day on Pasio!
ch0116_00_hikari/2511_0701_03_10:
You should come visit the Sinnoh region sometime!
I’d be happy to show you around!
ch0116_00_hikari/2511_0702_01_10:
Not only are you kind to Pokémon,
[Name:PlayerNickname ], but I know I can
count on you in a pinch.
ch0116_00_hikari/2511_0702_02_10:
I wonder if I’ll be able to find the secret to your
strength and kindness if I stay with you.
ch0116_00_hikari/3001_0701_01_10:
Hey there! Starting an adventure first thing in the
morning, huh? You sure you have everything
you need?
ch0116_00_hikari/3002_0701_01_10:
It’s great that Pasio’s so lively during the day,
but I also love how quiet it gets here in the
morning before everyone wakes up.
ch0116_00_hikari/3003_0701_01_10:
I wonder what it’d be like to grab a couple of
bikes and go riding along the beach.
Sounds super nice, right?!
ch0116_00_hikari/3004_0701_01_10:
The warm sunshine feels so nice around this time
of day, don’t you think?
ch0116_00_hikari/3005_0701_01_10:
I know it’s not good to stay up late at night...
but it’s just so exciting to have adventures in
the dark!
ch0116_00_hikari/3006_0701_01_10:
I love taking walks in the moonlight. It’s not scary
as long as I have my Pokémon with me!
